2. djWasabi.container¶

Function specific to container “management” related actions.

djWasabi.container.createContainerCommand(configuration=None, owner=None, repository=None)[source]¶

Create a ‘docker run’ command based on configuration.

Parameters

  • configuration (dict) – The Docker configuration.

  • owner (str) – The name of the owner of the repository.

  • repository (str) – The name of the repository

Return type

str

Returns

The complete url to the Github repository

djWasabi.container.getValueArg(value=None, owner=None, repository=None)[source]¶

Create a ‘docker run’ command based on configuration.

Parameters

  • value (str) – The variable you want to get.

  • owner (str) – The name of the owner of the repository.

  • repository (str) – The name of the repository

Return type

str

Returns

The complete url to the Github repository

djWasabi.container.validateDockerRunning()[source]¶

Validate if Docker is running.

Return type

bool

Returns

If Docker is running (True) or not (False)
